text: Lindley Armstrong "Spike" Jones (December 14, 1911 â€“ May 1, 1965) was an American musician, actor, comedian and bandleader. He was known for creating spoof arrangements of popular songs and classical music. Jones and his band recorded under the title Spike Jones and His City Slickers from the early 1940s to the mid-1950s.
